text: University of the Pacific () is a private autonomous university in Chile. It has three headquarters in Santiago, one in Melipilla, and an office in Concepción. == History == It was founded in 1990. == Faculties == * Agronomy * Design * Photography * Education * Pedagogy * Nursing * Engineering * Journalism * Economical & Business Sciences == Other websites == * Universidad del Pacífico - Chile Category:Private Chilean universities Category:Colleges and universities in Chile Category:1990 establishments in Chile
title: University of the Pacific
